attributes.action: Bill and Judith Forster .Abandon the plans to create Polyclinics and leave GPs surgeries as they are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are completely satisfied with the way our Gps organise their surgery opening hours. Appointments are readily available and we can always gain access to the doctor either by phone or face to face

rejection.details: Names should not appear in main petition statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
